message: I read somewhere it'll be 10 years of Apple retail stores. So... a ton of absurd giveaways?

It would be fun if they stopped launching iPhones at events and just dropped them on us, driving people in-store like crazy people. So, iPhone 4GS that got rumored a few days/weeks ago is another option.
(or if they didn't think a processor + memory bump for something like a 4GS was enough to warrant showing at WWDC next month)
More realistically, though: solid gold unibody MacBook Air.
Wow... seems like something is suddenly on the docket.  iPhone 4GS wouldn't surprise me too much.  Otherwise I have no idea.
hilariously, the first commenter on the macrumors post made the same joke i did
sigh, it's so hard to be original nowadays
they're probably just having the meeting to adjust shifts to replace the employees who get taken away in the Rapture

Hmm.. I wonder if they'll do anything in the UK. Wish I lived near an Apple store so I could be there if they start to give stuff away like you suggested. Unfortunately I have to leave the country to get to my nearest one...
my new theory is that they're going to be unveiling a new POS system featuring square technology
Ooooh. What if they buy Square as the basis for their NFC platform?
@Lloyd I definitely think that could be part of it
@Lloyd how would square help their NFC plans? They are just a CC payment processing house. It wouldn't help them with anything.
Square is an established payment platform and people are starting to trust it. I don't think they'd want Square; though - they'd want Jack Dorsey. He's done good things with Square
And the Answer Is: Interactive iPad signs http://www.tuaw.com/2011/05/21/apple-store-2-0-launches-with-interactive-ipads-more/
Rapture my Mac. Back to my Mac. Get it? Yeah, pretty late on that one haha
